dc_title_s: Imperii Persici in omnes suas provincias : (tam veteribus quam modernis erundem nominibus signatas) exacte divisi nova tabula geographica, quam ex precipuis Olearii, Tavernieri, Relandi aliorumque recentium authorum scriptis concinnatam / Io. Baptista Homann.
dc_description_s: Map no. 83 from vol. 1 of "Atlas novus terrarum orbis," by J.B. Homann. Also in "Atlas Maior" by R. Ottens. Decorative cartouche and illustration. 1 map : hand col. ; 47 X 56 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
